reviews.review: very good allround game, needs too work on its anti-cheat though

I have nearly 3000 hours on this absolute piece of garbage game. Valve ignores it and many of the issues that have been around for years are still present. This game is like heroin. It's fun for a little. But slowly, as you realize how much time it's taken from you, as you realize the damage it's doing to your mind, you come to despise it. But it's not so simple. You can't just walk away from it. You always come crawling back. After a few months or a few years, you will inevitably come back to this godforsaken, buggy, laggy, filled with hackers hell hole. Don't do CSGO kids. Stay clean.

EDIT Oh hey, VAC is unable to verify my game session. Will I have to verify my game files and reinstall DirectX? Will I have to restart Steam? Will I have to restart my computer? Who knows, all that I know is that it's going to be another few minutes of my time that I will never get back.

EDIT 2 2k hours later and still crawling back like the abused, whimpering dog that I am
The game is a big piece of hot smoking smelly shit.
